-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Helpers to bind digestive-functors onto wai requests
--   
--   Allows forms build with 'digestive-functors' to easy get their data
--   out of wai requests.
@package wai-digestive-functors
@version 0.3


-- | Helpers to bind 'digestive-functors' onto a <tt>wai</tt> request
module Network.Wai.Digestive

-- | Build an <a>Env</a> from a query
queryFormEnv :: (QueryLike q, Monad m) => q -> Env m

-- | Build an <a>Env</a> from a request body
bodyFormEnv :: (Monad m, MonadIO io) => BackEnd FilePath -> Request -> io (Env m)

-- | Build an <a>Env</a> from a request body
--   
--   Uses a default temporary file <a>BackEnd</a>
bodyFormEnv_ :: (Monad m, MonadIO io) => Request -> ResourceT io (Env m)

-- | Build an <a>Env</a> from request body and query string
requestFormEnv :: (Monad m, MonadIO io) => BackEnd FilePath -> Request -> io (Env m)

-- | Build an <a>Env</a> from request body and query string
--   
--   Uses a default temporary file <a>BackEnd</a>
requestFormEnv_ :: (Monad m, MonadIO io) => Request -> ResourceT io (Env m)
instance QueryLike FileQuery
